text: Di laangi nomuli, gei gimaadou gaa hula gi di Hale Daumaha ga pauna nia silber mono goolo, mo nia goloo ala i golo, gaa lawa gaa wanga nia maa gi tangada hai mee dabu go Meremoth, tama daane ni Uriah. Nia daangada ala nogo madalia a mee la go Eleazar tama ni Phinehas mo nia daangada o Levi dogolua go Jozabad, tama ni Jeshua mo Noadiah tama ni Binnui.
